exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n m H. destruct m. - right. reflexivity. - destruct n. + left. reflexivity. + assert (H0: S (S n) * S (S m) = S (S n) * S m + S (S n)). * rewrite <- Nat.mul_succ_r. reflexivity. * rewrite H in H0. assert (H1: S (S n) * S m + S (S n) = S (S n) * S m + S m). { rewrite <- Nat.mul_succ_l. reflexivity. } rewrite H1 in H0. apply Nat.succ_inj in H0. discriminate H0.
